website_summaries.verdict: With a host of features, this model won't disappoint anyone who wants a challenging workout.
pros: Has a powerful motor that is unexpectedly quiet
Low-impact track is easy on the joints while the incline that can go up to 15 percent challenges your workout
cons: While the 10-inch screen is nice, those of other models in this price range have larger dimensions

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first week we got it. Now we had to order a new motor. DO NOT BUY! Customer service is horrible and now I have to wait an indefinite amount of time for parts because they are "not in stock"
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Klausz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Motor went out after 9 weeks. Only was averaging one hour a day use. There's a lifetime warranty on the motor but it took four weeks to get a replacement and then have to install it yourself. Not happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience from the carrier XPO wasting 26 hours of my time for scheduled deliveries over 3 days ( was not delivered all 3.) Assembly is rough I have carpentry exp. directions visually unclear. Prefab holes don't line up for pulse bar or the 31 trey. Needed to reem hole for pulse bar to fit. I have to go without the trey 31 unfastened . Mom wants to buy 1 I am advising not to unless professionally so they can deal with the poor craftsmanship .
customer_reviews.author: matt maier

customer_reviews.title: Norditrack does not stand behind their products. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill lasted a little over 1/2 year, and I am just a casual runner. I am sure the motor is toasted. I contacted the company on Aug-15. Today is Sept-9, and I still haven't heard from them. This company does not stand behind its products. I will never buy anything from this company again. People don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Khanh C. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: The nordic track 1650 treadmill
customer_reviews.text: 1 wk after receiving the treadmill, we had problems with the motor. Nordic Track did replace it and we received it 8 days later. You can't control the direction of the fan. When I'm walking, my foot periodically hits the top panel above the belt. Before buying a treadmill, you should walk on the exact model you are going to buy
customer_reviews.author: nanci Enblom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...
customer_reviews.text: Spent the whole day putting it together...and it's busted. Belt doesn't move, horrible popping noise from the machine. Submitted for warranty today (Sunday), will update once I hear something from NordicTrack. Not happy....
customer_reviews.author: P. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money. We had one issue with the motor out of the box so weren't able to use it for two weeks but CS sent a new one out and no problems since. CS was quick and responsive. This is a great machine for the money. The touchscreen is large and responsive. Great to watch videos or access music without secondary devices while running. Belt is smooth and motor is strong. It sounds like there may be some quality control issues out or the box but CS was eager to make right and we've been using it for 2 months with no problems to report.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Don't put your wallet away
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great, but after spending over $1k I would have liked all the features to be included. I have to subscribe to iFit to unlock a lot of the cool programs it advertises. That subscription is around $150/year
customer_reviews.author: J. Landis

customer_reviews.title: Great...but then there is iFit!
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill is great. I normally run on it for about 40 mins, 3 days/wk. I have had it for more than 2 months now and can say that it is a solid treadmill. I have seen inconsistent calorie count when I use preprogrammed exercises. When I use manual mode calorie count is more accurate. To use full functionality of this machine though, you will need to subscribe to iFit for annual charge of $99. I think after spending $800+ on treadmill asking more $$ to get full functionality out of it is absolutely petty.
customer_reviews.author: Nilesh Deshpande

customer_reviews.title: Had to return machine. Belt was sticking and humming ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return machine. Belt was sticking and humming sound heard on main display area within a few days of assembly. Maybe I had a defective product, but I am not taking chances and will not reorder the same treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin J.

customer_reviews.title: Met my standards
customer_reviews.text: Took us a couple hours to set up , but totally worth it. A note to remember- to get all the features they tell u, u have to pay 120 a year for a Fitbit membership
customer_reviews.author: Jessy zhang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price & purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not happy......forcing to pay for subscription. Apps doesnt work. Worst product. Customer service never answers and will go to automated message. Worst Customer service. Once they sell, they never care about the issue. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Kishore

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, very hard to fix under warranty
customer_reviews.text: The unit came broken. It powered up sometimes but had to be cycled. It never worked correctly. The warranty process still has not fixed it and they claim that there is additional minimal handling charges even though Amazon says 5 yr parts and 2 yr labor. It is a terrible way to start a fitness program. Get up early and flip a coin if you can get on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Zozobra

customer_reviews.title: You can find a better product
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have an ifit account, which can cost $12 per month, you will only have basic functions. I am 5'4" the fan is angled quite high and not adjustable, ie worthless to me. The motor is at the front of the unit and if I want to reach the handrails/storage areas/screen, I will kick/step on the motor housing. The motor feels sluggish. I wonder if the unit will work at all if the screen goes out....I am guessing no.
customer_reviews.author: lululec

customer_reviews.title: NordicTrack / Icon Health and Fitness Customer Service gets an "F."
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill worked OK for about a year then motor started vibrating, making noise and slowing down without any prompt from me. NordicTrack Customer Service has very poor with trying to get this resolved. Multiple emails with questions doing diagnostics on what the problem is. The emails usually contain 1 question. When I send the answer to the question it takes days to get a response from them. Now 30 days after the problem was originally reported I have been told that the motor has been ordered but it is out of stock with no estimated date when it will become available.
customer_reviews.author: JetSkyWalker

customer_reviews.title: The motor went bad after less than 8 months of light use and ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! The motor went bad after less than 8 months of light use and Nordic Track is now playing stupid about fixing my treadmill. I wish I could return it, it is now a fire hazard so I had to unplug it. $1,300 for a POS clothes hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mehoff

customer_reviews.title: What customer service?
customer_reviews.text: The most awful customer service or shall I say lack of I have ever encountered. Tread motor stopped working early November. I STILL do not have a working treadmill and it is under warranty. no one responds. the wait time to speak with someone via telephone is over an hour. it's atrocious. I purchased a new PELOTON Treadmill and was hoping to use this nordic track elsewhere. I'd rather purchase another PELOTON than continue to wait to have this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: tracey paulsen

customer_reviews.title: No more excuses...
customer_reviews.text: Free delivery into my garage. One single heavy box, packaged well. Clear instructions. Nuts, bolts, washers packaged & identified clearly. I assembled by myself in less than 3 hours. One step would have been easier with a helper but not impossible solo. Treadmill operation relies solely on tablet / display - hopefully it isn’t a weak link in the future. Easy to operate. Haven’t tried signing up / logging in with iFit yet.
customer_reviews.author: WA AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: And Amazon for terrible shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Order two separate machines from Nordic. One Delivered with a broken screen monitor. One the magnetic wheel does not work. Free assembly was guy who didn't know how to put it together. Now I can even use it and Nordic is shipping a replacement piece within the next week. For the amount of money this cost completely not worth it. Shame on Nordic for their product. And Amazon for terrible shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Carr

customer_reviews.title: motor gave out
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill is great. When I get lazy to go to the gym, I can always run with no problems. I bought this treadmill about a year ago and recently started using it the couple months 3 to 4 times a week. I'm about 150 lbs and the motor seems to already be giving out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Broken, Under Warranty and NoricTrack refuses to Help
customer_reviews.text: My treadmill broke within 11 months of owning it. It is under warranty for 3 years...I contacted NordicTrack for help and they sent me a replacement controller, which took 14 business days to arrive. Once it arrived, the treadmill was still unresponsive; therefore I contacted NordicTrack again and they sent me a replacement motor and controller again. After another 14 days, I finally received these parts and the treadmill is still not working. I requested a service technician to come out to my house to assist, but NordicTrack refuses to send anyone out to fix my machine which is still under warranty for another 2 years! DO NOT BUY THIS LEMON
customer_reviews.author: mpayton97

customer_reviews.title: Motor broke
customer_reviews.text: Used this for an hour a day (walking), about 5 times a week for 16 months. The motor broke. They have offered a free one via the warranty, however, they are on "back order" and Nordictrack says they have NO idea when they will get in. My repair guy said that it will be months.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget 2525

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Quite and smooth belt
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Quite and smooth belt, well worth the money however, I STRONGLY recommend adding assembly, well worth the $15.00, they're pro's at it and can do it easily, my husband is very handy and it took him and my brother hours to put it together. I would recommend Nordic Track to anyone I know looking for a great treadmill!! Maria
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Losing Weight
customer_reviews.text: I love my treadmill; I purchased this last July and it's still working smoothly with no problems and most importantly, I've lost weight. My only complaint, I just wish the fan was a little lower so it could cool my face directly, but other than that I am very happy with my purchase, and I'm looking forward to winter knowing that I can still continue my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: great machine.  reasonably quiet running.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet operation was important. This is a well constructed machine. I am older so I am not running on it, but reasonable walking speed with a 3% incline is what I do most mornings. The only negative I have found is the fan placement. In order to blow on your face you have to stand close to the front of the machine. Cannot do that as my feet hit the front guard. I would recommend this machine if you can commit to exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this treadmill for about two years now and so far so good. It works very smoothly and it has everything I need for my workouts. Considering the price, I absolutely got a best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my smooth running treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and took about 3 hours to put together. This is my first Nordic Track and I can't believe it runs so smoothly. My old treadmill was so much harder to run on. It has Wi-Fi so the ifit Bluetooth app doesn't work with it. I just log in to my ifit account on my Ipad and it allows me to see my live workout that is on my Nordic screen. I prefer using my Ipad because it has a nicer picture on it then the Nordic screen.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! I bought this unit in order to prepare for double lung transplant surgery. I continue to use it post surgery because it gives me a better work out than simply walking city streets. I give the credit to the ease of hiking mountains to 9000 ft. to the use of the treadmill. It has operated flawlessly since I bought it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lort

customer_reviews.title: depends on your speed
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes: at slow speed it has a bit of a jerky quality to the belt movement that fortunately is not noticeable once up to speed. The heart monitor doesn't seem at all accurate. Likes: Seems sturdy and the lift/drop down of the running platform is slow rather than a hard, fast drop.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Talley

customer_reviews.title: This is great and all..
customer_reviews.text: But it's near impossible to move from room to room. word of advice, build it in it's final resting place. while you can tip it on it's side and maneuver it from room to room, you risk scratching the sides
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Lost some points because the bottom tray was not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Actually should be a 4.5. Lost some points because the bottom tray was not easy to install, as the bolts were tough to reach. The installation instructions were clear. The nuts and bolts were clearly marked on the cardboard to which they had been shrink wrapped. It took my wife and I about 3 hours to put it together. Wasn't difficult, just took a while. I like that I can transmit the audio from phone or tablet thru the treadmill speakers. Chose to not enroll in the iFit programs, because the treadmill comes with 30+ onboard programs. Definitely recommend this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: jim blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill! I had an issue with the ordering
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill! I had an issue with the ordering, I was supposed to get the free set up with my purchase at that time but it didn't happen. I called Amazon Customer Service and they are just so amazing! I highly recommend this especially sold by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Good motor but poor quality media.
customer_reviews.text: The machine and motor are solid but the screen freezes frequently during runs. It also shows a heart rate on the screen when I'm not touching the sensors. This messes up the other on screen indicators such as fan speed and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Brenin2

customer_reviews.title: A great product... but...
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill is great and we the family has really used it. But I do have a tech question where as we cannot seem to shut off the screen when we finish our work out. Any suggestions or have a tech person call me at 858.880.8798 when you get a moment. But its a high quality product! Thank you! Chris A. Banta Nordic Track Athlete
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: It does not give accurate heart rate. it fluctuates ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not give accurate heart rate. it fluctuates very high to very low. and in 1 hour of walking on trade mil, not one time it gave correct heart rate. while walking or staln still all the readings were wrong. because I checked with my BP monotor which I keep all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kush Desai

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a defective product., The treadmill has ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a defective product., The treadmill has only 177 miles of use and needs a new motor and control panel. I'm still waiting on NordicTrack to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made and works well
customer_reviews.text: We have had our treadmill for about a month now. The delivery and installation from Amazon was very smooth and the treadmill seems to work very well and seems well made. We did subscribe to iFit (Nordic’s subscription service) to unlock all of the Google map features. I like being able to set a route on Google Maps and have the treadmill follow the terrain while looking at Google streetview, but wish it had come free with the treadmill rather than as part of a subscription. Other than that, my only other wish is that there was a direct link to my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill and Assembly; Poor Shipping/Handling
customer_reviews.text: My family has been using the treadmill for the last 2-3 weeks and has thoroughly enjoyed it with no issues. The built-in/iFIT programs are excellent, and the tread is super smooth and easy to walk/run on. The built-in speakers work great and integrated music is a nice plus. So far, so good! The box did come damaged and a piece was bent unfortunately (see pictures), but the install technician (Clayton) did a great job to "unbend" it and get it assembled in a timely manner. I had the option to return the unit, but didn't want to go thru the hassle. If it wasn't for this, I would rate the product/experience 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: mkr993

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality ... now if only I have the motivation to use it as often as I planned
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn

customer_reviews.title: When you can’t run on a treadmill what purpose does it serve?
customer_reviews.text: Has needed repair twice in less than four months. Not a happy runner.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: I love my treadmill and love that I can run inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I love my treadmill and love that I can run inside through the dreary winter. Pay for professional build, it was worth it as there are "nuances" you won't know about unless you build a lot of them!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little loud when running at high speed but very well built and designed.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!😆
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this treadmill, great price, with a lot of bells and whistles ! Only minor flaw is the fan is a little low, but other than that, it's pretty awesome! I definitely have and will recommend this product, cheers !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I like running to anywhere in the world.
customer_reviews.author: MzBullock

customer_reviews.title: Twice needed repair in less than two years
customer_reviews.text: Runs about .5 mph faster than it should. Just broke again. Technical support is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sigmond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: replaced my worn out machine with another Nordictrack, they have performed well for me
customer_reviews.author: Randall Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Dependability
customer_reviews.text: Treadmill is dependable and works well but the console is irradic and constantly needs resetting
customer_reviews.author: perfectshot

customer_reviews.title: Software out of order
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years not frequent use - it’s software out of order very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wang

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working and caused me to fall
customer_reviews.text: How can a $1400 treadmill break in 6 months? And it stopped suddenly while I was running. I tripped and fell. Now it only makes a noise but the bell doesn’t move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Deng

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The motor caught fire after only a few months. it was covered under the service and parts warranty... but that took about 4 months to get completed. Now it wont start, seems to be a software issue. Have spent 2 weeks trying to get service to respond to me again. BIG WASTE OF MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product/ fairly easy to install. Needs to 2 ppl to assemble in about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Sasso

customer_reviews.title: The instruction NSA for assembly were very easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The instruction NSA for assembly were very easy to follow...did need a few more tools though...it has done everything well with no problems..we will see in another 6-9months..so far so good..
customer_reviews.author: D. Durkee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My treadmills face is all scratched up and we wrote them and haven't heard a response.
customer_reviews.author: jsalas

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my treadmill! I love that I can listen to music through the equipment using my phone. I am also using many of the pre-set workouts. I love the mapped ones - it's so fun walking all over the world! I am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work after 1 time getting to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work after 1 time getting to use it. Lost so many hours with customer service .. sending it back
customer_reviews.author: lbar

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Used this treadmill this past winter and it was great. I lost 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: tag2

customer_reviews.title: NOT RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: BROKE DOWN 2ND TIMES IN 2 YEARS. SOFTWARE OR ELECTRONICS MALFUNCTION. MAIN BOARD WAS REPLACED ONE TIME. NOW IT HAS SAME OR SIMILAR SYMPTOM. NEVER STURDY AND WEEK STABILITY
customer_reviews.author: SHANG-IL ROH

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month and belt was already misaligned and motor start having unwanted sound not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bic

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY SOFTWARE ISSUES!!!!!.
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill has serious software issues, it shuts down in the middle of your work out. When you contacts customer service they cannot help you because they don’t have a solution for the problem.
customer_reviews.author: zenexe

customer_reviews.title: Expert assembly not true 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: When we ordered the product it says free expert assembly. When delivered I called them to schedule they said it’s not included . It’s a big lie will return the item. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Bry P.

customer_reviews.title: It was not fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was not fun to put together.... But it was worth it! I love this and everyday am walking.... Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Heart monitor is inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: The heart monitor is not accurate! It gives you crazy measurements! I'm very disappointed with this treadmill!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far LOVE IT!!! It does exactly what I need it to do! It has a ton of power to compare it to the treadmills at the gym. It’s just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stacee Torres

customer_reviews.title: IM SUGGESTING DO NOT  BUY NORDITRACK LIKE I DID BIG MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: In short bought a treadmill and it died in 12 months Norditrack has no customer service and when you do get help they expect you to be an electrician and troubleshooter. My biggest mistake ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I love this treadmill. I use it every morning. The best treadmill I ever owned. I highly recommend it. High quality machine. I give it a 10
customer_reviews.author: carole moran

customer_reviews.title: Professional Product with Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: We have used it for more than a year and enjoyed every moment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for a few months. So far so good. The only thing I have an issue with but it's not such a big issue, is the treadmill belt. I have never been able to get it just right in the middle. I notice that it sometimes slips if I walk faster which causes me to lose my balance. I have fallen once because of the slipping. Unless you're taller, I'm only 5'4", the fan won't hit you unless you actually lean over it. All in all, I'm glad I purchased it. I compared many many treadmills within my budget and this came out the winner.
customer_reviews.author: kglcmr

customer_reviews.title: Very good running experience!!
customer_reviews.text: I run 4 times a week now, like it very much. Safe and sound!
customer_reviews.author: David Cao

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill has been pulled away,the labelis handedover to the staff!
customer_reviews.author: Fanqiang Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. I love the ifit option
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. I love the ifit option. Have had no issues with it. Highly recommend. Upgraded from my c700.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper17

customer_reviews.title: The screen freezes consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two of these treadmills in Feb. 2017. After about six months, the screen and controls freezes after 30 minutes of use, so you have to unplug the machine and restart your workout again. This is happening more and more with every other day use. The second treadmill is starting to experience the freezing of the screen and controls also. Now, I will have to contact Nordiac Track company for assistance in fixing this problem. I have read that this will not be an easy task.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much . Everything it said it was and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it isn't horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill did not deliver quiet the result I expected, however, it isn't horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Suggs

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: It was everything that was advertised. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: We love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful piece for running. It provides great absorption as you are running and it is a quiet machine which is a benefit if you are trying to get an early workout in prior to your young ones waking up. The multiple workout options built within the programming provide a lot of variety to your workouts. The tablet holder is great and gives you an opportunity to watch a favorite episode, plug into music, or read. This machine is great!
customer_reviews.author: Andreana R. Fertig-Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Nice treadmill, but the fan is pointed way too ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice treadmill, but the fan is pointed way too high and blows over my head. It isn't adjustable. Also, the side rails are so big that I can hardly even wrap my hands around them. This seems to be the trend now.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I get shocked anytime I touch the heartrate monitor and the belt sticks pretty regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Difficult and confusing
customer_reviews.text: Assembly difficult and confusing, but other than that it works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Sonmi

customer_reviews.title: To be clear this product may be just fine, but the Amazon delivery/installation service is poor and ...
customer_reviews.text: To be clear this product may be just fine, but the Amazon delivery/installation service is poor and potentially dangerous. This service apparently consists only of dropping it at the front door, and assembly at the FINAL position in the home. Since the item weighs 222 pounds and moving it from the door to the final destination in the home is the BUYER's responsibility, you will need both strong help and proper tools (a good hand truck) to get this done. AMAZON NEEDS TO BE CLEAR ON THE MEANING OF "DELIVERY" AND "INSTALLATION" ON HEAVY ITEMS LIKE THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: kalin jones

customer_reviews.title: but this is a great treadmill. It's relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The packaging could use a bit more reinforcement, but this is a great treadmill. It's relatively easy to put together. The instructions are good. Pay attention when putting the control panel on so that it doesn't fall or pinch the wires. If it holds up, it will be a great treadmill for many years.
customer_reviews.author: MaddyIce

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Plastic used in the console while assembling the screws came through the tray in to the console, instruction are also wrong some items are installed and not mentioned some items requires dissembling and reassembly This is the first day i will update more as i find out more I am going to file a complain to amazon as well to see where it leads
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice treadmill at a great price. I've only had it for a week but it's exactly as described. You need a really strong wifi signal to keep the google street map that's so popular with this item running. Mine is strong but it keeps dropping off and reconnecting. The tread runs really smooth and you can feel the cushioned support. I've waited a long time to upgrade my treadmill. I owned a Pro Form before this treadmill that has lasted me years. I almost went with the newer one of that brand but decided to take a chance on this one because of the larger screen. Time will tell if that was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Keleidescope

customer_reviews.title: It is a good looking piece of machinery and I'm looking forward to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a preliminary review as I have not been able to spend much time on it yet. It is a good looking piece of machinery and I'm looking forward to using it regularly when my kitchen remodel is done and there is enough room. Speakers are amazing. Really excited.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice treadmill. I am 6'3" and weigh 240 lbs. The track slips a little when I run on my toes. The wife and kids are not having that problem. When the weather is bad or its dark outside it's a good way for me to still get a couple miles in. The track is long enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy treadmills through Amazon. They are defective and Amazon nor Nordic Track will stand behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob N

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: High-quality treadmill. It meets all my need. I love working out on it for two hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. So far it works well and i am happy
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 10+ mph for 200+ lbs. people = Not the best treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I've had the treadmill for a few months now. Solid treadmill, and I really like the shock absorbent running platform, and it's been great for jogging at speeds 9 mph and slower. But when I speed it up to 10+ mph the belt starts sliding forward in small increments as I take each stride. It gets worse as I speed it up to 12 mph, so bad that I don't even try to run on it over ~10.5 mph anymore. For reference, I'm 6'2" and 205 lbs. I have no idea what causes this issue, but I've got to imagine it's due to the motor size. I probably should have gone for a bigger horse motor.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Don’t impressed and haven’t used it. Peeling off the tape ruined the display and the WiFi is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Missing part cannot assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Received this today maybe an hour ago and already noticed that it is missing a part. I was told I have 48 hours to contact seller and there is no option for me on here to do so. Part 81 is missing. All I got was a thin wire with no connection.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great treadmill, all the setting work work. The only thing that seems to be a problem is the blood pressure sensor, sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. Also if you get iFit, you get these cool google workout routes.
customer_reviews.author: Rethink

customer_reviews.title: I put it together!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put together. Definitely takes two people. Too about 2.5 hours. Directions are nice. Works well. Very nice speakers and quiet performance. I love the ease of letting treadmill up and down. Don't like the fact that while viewing my YouTube video, I couldn't see my calories, mileage, time and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it could have been a better product but it is not
customer_reviews.text: This product is overly priced for its feature. It started and stopped abruptly. I almost fell down during one session, The touch screen is not very responsive. To access a loaded app you need to put quite an effort. it could have been a better product but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Debajyoti Chanda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on schedule and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Had for one month now. Arrived on schedule and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: For myself, it is too complicated to use it. The NordicTrack was made for a computer wizard. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Byung Kang

customer_reviews.title: at home exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great machine - still trying to navigate thru the various workouts. We only have it a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T. Goodrich

product_meta.title: NordicTrack C 1650 Treadmill
product_meta.description:
Go online while you work out. The C1650 Treadmill features a stable bracket that secures your tablet at eye level above the console to deliver your favorite Entertainment while you train. Plus, a 10-inch touchscreen display offers your favorite websites, workout stats, and Google maps workouts from if it technology to take your training on the road. . Choose from calorie, heart rate Control, incline, and speed workout programs 

*Continuous Horsepower ("CHP") is a term used in the treadmill industry for consumer comparison purposes. The CHP rating is measured in laboratory testing using a dynamometer, which measures the mechanical power of the motor. The CHP rating does not denote the operational horsepower of the treadmill in ordinary household use. In ordinary household use, the motor does not operate at the horsepower shown.
feature_bullets: Interactive Personal Training at Home powered by iFit; gain access to on demand, interactive trainer led global and studio workout programs; membership required, sold separately

10 inches HD Interactive Touchscreen Display can stream personalized iFit workouts (membership required, sold separately) directly to your treadmill; track your speed, calorie burn, and other important stats
12 percent OneTouch incline control, 12 MPH SMART OneTouch speed control; spacious 20 x 60 inches tread belt
A powerful 3.5 CHP* DurX Smart Response Motor features reduced motor noise and self cooling technology; perfect for running, jogging, and walking in the comfort of your home
Innovative SpaceSaver design with EasyLift Assist means your treadmill can fold up after your run for compact, simple storage
